Description:
Hear from the pioneers at Adobe, eClinicalWorks, and more, who turned Microsoft Foundry models into game-changing solutions. If you want to see how code becomes impact, accelerating innovation, transforming productivity, and creating a better future, this Foundry session is your front-row seat.
